application-bootstrap.title: Application Bootstrap
application-bootstrap.description: How NasNet initializes from a blank slate to a fully-running system — the wiring of 13 service

build-and-deploy.title: Build and Deploy
build-and-deploy.description: Documents the multi-stage Docker build pipeline, binary compression, embedded frontend serving,

connection-management.title: Connection Management
connection-management.description: Per-router connection pool with circuit breaker protection, exponential-backoff reconnection, periodic health monitoring, and hardware/software capability detection with 24-hour caching.

data-layer.title: Data Layer
data-layer.description: Hybrid SQLite architecture with a single system database, lazy-loaded per-router databases, the "Light Repository" pattern, and ent ORM as the query layer.

error-handling.title: Error Handling & Structured Logging
error-handling.description: Hierarchical error types, automatic log-level routing, GraphQL error presentation, and sensitive-data redaction across the NasNetConnect backend.

event-system.title: Event System
event-system.description: Typed, priority-based event bus built on Watermill GoChannel, connecting all backend subsystems through decoupled publish-subscribe communication.

feature-marketplace.title: Feature Marketplace
feature-marketplace.description: Downloadable privacy and network services for MikroTik routers: manifest-driven binary distribution, cryptographic verification, atomic updates, config migration, and service import/export.

flows/alert-lifecycle-flow.title: Flow: Alert Lifecycle
flows/alert-lifecycle-flow.description: Traces the complete path of an alert from an event triggering the engine, through throttle and

flows/config-provisioning-flow.title: Flow: Config Provisioning
flows/config-provisioning-flow.description: Traces how a desired router configuration is applied through an 8-phase pipeline, with verification and automatic rollback on failure.

flows/device-routing-chain-flow.title: Flow: Device Routing Chain
flows/device-routing-chain-flow.description: Traces how a client device's traffic is steered through a multi-hop service chain (e.g., Device → VPN → Tor → Internet) using MikroTik PBR mangle rules, with kill switch enforcement on service failure.

flows/graphql-request-lifecycle.title: Flow: GraphQL Request Lifecycle
flows/graphql-request-lifecycle.description: Traces the complete path of a GraphQL request from TCP arrival at the Echo HTTP server through

flows/router-connection-flow.title: Flow: Router Connection Establishment
flows/router-connection-flow.description: Traces how the backend connects to a MikroTik router, automatically selecting the best available protocol with circuit-breaker protection.

flows/service-installation-flow.title: Flow: Service Installation
flows/service-installation-flow.description: Traces the full lifecycle of installing a marketplace feature — from the GraphQL mutation to a running, supervised process.

flows/service-update-flow.title: Flow: Service Update
flows/service-update-flow.description: Traces the lifecycle of a service binary update — from scheduled version check through atomic 6-phase swap with config migration, health validation, and crash recovery.

getting-started.title: Getting Started
getting-started.description: Everything you need to set up a local development environment, understand the project layout, and run the NasNet backend.

graphql-api.title: GraphQL API Layer
graphql-api.description: Schema-first GraphQL API with domain-organized resolvers, custom directives, and DataLoader batching.

index.title: NasNet Backend — Master Index
index.description: A Go service that manages MikroTik routers, orchestrates downloadable network features, and

intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: The Backend is a Go service that serves as the core of NasNet. It manages router connections, provides a GraphQL API, and handles service orchestration.

network-services.title: Network Services
network-services.description: Stateless service layer for firewall rules, DNS lookups, network scanning, bridge management, and internet troubleshooting — all operating through the RouterPort abstraction.

provisioning-engine.title: Provisioning Engine
provisioning-engine.description: Translates a wizard-configured StarState into live RouterOS configuration via an 8-phase ordered pipeline with per-step rollback.

router-communication.title: Router Communication
router-communication.description: Multi-protocol adapter system with automatic fallback, circuit breaking, and batch execution for MikroTik RouterOS devices.

security.title: Security
security.description: Multi-layer security model: JWT RS256 authentication, bcrypt+NIST password policy, AES-256-GCM credential encryption, GraphQL directive-based authorization, and sensitive field redaction throughout.

service-orchestrator.title: Service Orchestrator
service-orchestrator.description: Lifecycle management for downloadable feature services: boot sequencing, process supervision, isolation verification, health monitoring, and resource control.

translator-layer.title: Translator Layer
translator-layer.description: Bidirectional translation between GraphQL field names and RouterOS property names, with type conversion, SSH response parsing, and protocol-specific command formatting.

validation-pipeline.title: Validation Pipeline
validation-pipeline.description: Multi-domain input validation across router connection parameters, service configuration, network scanning targets, manifest metadata, and ARP subnet constraints.

virtual-interface-factory.title: Virtual Interface Factory (VIF)
virtual-interface-factory.description: Transforms service instances into routable VLAN-isolated network interfaces on MikroTik routers, enabling per-device traffic steering through services like Tor, sing-box, and Xray.
